description:
A sophisticated cyberespionage operation dubbed “Operation Digital Eye” has been attributed to a suspected Chinese Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) group.  According to Aleksandar Milenkoski, Senior Threat Researcher at SentinelLabs, and Luigi Martire, Senior Malware Analyst at Tinexta Cyber, the campaign targeted large business-to-business (B2B) IT service providers in southern Europe between late June and mid-July... Read more »

The post Operation Digital Eye: Chinese hackers exploit Visual Studio Code appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Operation Digital Eye: Chinese hackers exploit Visual Studio Code
